title: Dark Horse's Deluxe Edition Dragon Age Art Book Is Steeply Discounted At Amazon
description: The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard Deluxe Edition $79.31 (was $100) See at Amazon The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard $38.30 (was $50) See at Amazon Dragon Age fans can pick up the official art book for The Veilguard at a fairly substantial discount for a limited time at Amazon. The Deluxe Edition hardcover is up for grabs for $79.31 (was $100), while the standard hardcover version is $38.30 (was $50). Published by Dark Horse in November, The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard was created in collaboration with the BioWare development team, and features 256 pages full of concept art, promotional illustrations, and more. If you haven't picked up the game yet, Amazon and GameStop are selling Dragon Age: The Veilguard for only $25 (was $70), but this deal likely won't be available for very long.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard is a 256-page look at the creation of BioWare's latest RPG.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Dragon Age fans can pick up the official art book for The Veilguard at a fairly substantial discount for a limited time at Amazon. The Deluxe Edition hardcover is up for grabs for $79.31 (was $100), while the standard hardcover version is $38.30 (was $50). Published by Dark Horse in November, The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard was created in collaboration with the BioWare development team, and features 256 pages full of concept art, promotional illustrations, and more.

If you haven't picked up the game yet, Amazon and GameStop are selling Dragon Age: The Veilguard for only $25 (was $70), but this deal likely won't be available for very long.

The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard Deluxe Edition (Hardcover)

$79.31 ($100)

The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard Deluxe Edition includes:

  • A foil-stamped slipcase and cover
  • Gilded pages
  • A ribbon book marker
  • Two lithographic art prints with portfolio

Amazon has the Deluxe Edition price marked as a "limited-time deal," but it's unclear when the price will return to $100. It's possible that the store page will default to a third-party seller; if that's the case when you click, choose "Other sellers on Amazon" and select "Add to Cart" next to the listing that's shipped and sold by Amazon.

The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard Standard Edition (Hardcover)

$38.30 ($50)

If you don't need the extras of the Deluxe Edition--or want to save some cash--you can instead grab the standard edition of The Art of Dragon Age: The Veilguard for $38.30 (was $50). This version features different cover art and doesn't come with any other frills of the Deluxe Edition, but the content covered in the book is otherwise identical.

More Dragon Age Books and Comics

There are also tons of other great Dragon Age books out there you can read right now ahead of the new game. The 500-page, two-volume Dragon Age: The World of Thedas hardcover box set is one highlight, offering an in-depth look into the world of Dragon Age, its history, and the many people, places, and events therein. There are also numerous Dragon Age graphic novels available, including Dragon Age: The Missing, which serves as a prequel to The Veilguard, and an omnibus containing five graphic novels for $25.33.

  • Dragon Age: The World of Thedas Box Set (Hardcover) -- $60
  • Dragon Age: The Missing (Paperback) -- $18.59 ($20)
  • Dragon Age: The First Five Graphic Novels (Paperback) -- $25.33 ($30)
  • Dragon Age: Wraiths of Tevinter (Hardcover) -- $31.67 ($40)
  • Dragon Age: The Official Cookbook (Hardcover) -- $28.77 ($35)
  • Dragon Age: 5-Book Collection (Paperback) -- $50.44
  • Dragon Age: Tevinter Nights (Paperback) -- $18
  • Dragon Age RPG Core Rulebook -- $64
